I think.translation[0].definitions[0].de: used when you are saying that you believe something is true, although you are not sure
I think.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: Mary is in the garden, I think.
I don’t think Ray will mind.
‘Do you understand what I mean?’ ‘Yes, I think so.’
‘Haven’t we met before?’ ‘I don’t think so.’
I thought he was honest, but I was wrong.
